column1: Topic of the ontology

column11: Data source that inspired the ontology
column12: Application or service (could be based on Machine learning problem) this ontology could be used for. It could be a machine learning problem that will be fed with the data modelled by this ontology.  The task the ontology is expected to do includes: Classification, recommendation, matchmaking, consistency checks, information retrieval, etc.
